### Types of Changes
<!--- Mark each that apply with an 'x' such that [ ] would become [x] -->
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Performance Enhancement
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Command Breakage (behavior of existing arguments or .cfg directives is changed)
- [ ] Documentation Change
- [ ] Other (Please explain)
